notes.title: portfolio project
notes.detail: create a advance project using mern stack . include features like authentication and authorization with jwt and bycrpt , otp verification with twilio , state management using redux.js , create server using express.js , use cdn for storing medias , use react as frontend framework, material ui as designing the website, include forgot password , email verification  etc......

notes.title: food delivery app
notes.detail: create a a food delivery app with admin dashboard, user dashboard , restuarant owner dashboard , delivery boy dashboard, include features like authentication and autherisation with jwt and bycrypt , otp validation with twilio , email verification , licensce verification for delivery boys , intergrate online payment like upi , razorpay , intergrate google map api for delivery boys , track order feature , wallet , use mongodb as database , react for frontend framework , express for backend framework , use cdn for storing medias , make clean code and modularize code  , redux for state management . material ui for design
